entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, a dark wizard who has planted a vision in Harry's mind.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard who has spoken with Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, a young wizard who is struggling to come to terms with his situation.

entities.name: wizarding world
entities.description: A community of wizards and witches that Harry wants to inform about Voldemort's return.

relationships.description: Voldemort has planted a vision in Harry's mind, making him question his own sanity.
Harry had a conversation with Dumbledore that left him feeling isolated and uncertain.
Harry wants to inform the Wizarding world about Voldemort's return, but is unsure if they will believe him.
